item.title: Start Spinal Muscular Atrophy Treatment at Birth?
item.description: Starting oral risdiplam soon after birth may put babies with spinal muscular atrophy on the path to normal development, new research shows. Medscape M...

item.title: Weight Loss Before Military Training May Cut Injury Risk
item.description: Losing excess weight before entering military training may reduce the risk for musculoskeletal injuries among incoming recruits, a recent study shows....

item.title: BP Meds Should Begin Promptly, New ACC/AHA Guidelines Say
item.description: The new guidelines lower the threshold for beginning blood pressure medications, among other notable changes. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Australian GPs Gain Expanded Role in Treating ADHD
item.description: Some specialists urge caution about relying too heavily on general practitioners to diagnose and treat ADHD. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Cycling and Education for Hip OA: A Cost-Effective Solution?
